Dear Parents,
We would like to kindly remind you that the ‘Parent Lens’ Nord Anglia Education parent survey that you were invited to take part in at the end of last week (Friday) will close this Thursday, 20th February 2014. If you wish to contribute comments to improve your school by taking part in this survey and have not done so already, Please join the survey through the links above, before Friday this week.
We would like to thank all our parents who have already taken part- your comments and contributions are very much appreciated and valued!
Best wishes,
Mr. Mark Thomas Principal
The British School of Guangzhou
